name: CPMapButton
desc: A button that represents an action that a map template displays on the CarPlay screen.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display on the button.

items.name: var focusedImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display when focus is on the button.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that enables and disables the map button.

items.name: var isHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that hides and shows the map button.
